ModMetaData.name: Show Known Techprints
ModMetaData.author: SpaceMoth
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds a new icon next to all techprints to indicate if the techprint has been applied or not. No more will you buy duplicate techprints or sell the ones you need without realising!
Hovering over the new icon will also tell you what you will unlock by researching and how many tech prints are required.
